mapper.select: SELECT a.course_code, a.course_name, a.course_sortation, a.course_credit, a.course_limit, b.professor_name FROM course a inner join professor b on a.professor_id = b.professor_id

SELECT a.professor_id, a.professor_name, b.course_code, b.course_sortation, b.course_name, b.course_credit, b.course_limit FROM professor a INNER JOIN course b on a.professor_id = b.professor_id INNER JOIN course_package c on b.course_code = c.course_code WHERE student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT a.professor_id, a.professor_name, b.course_code, b.course_sortation, b.course_name, b.course_credit, b.course_limit FROM professor a INNER JOIN course b on a.professor_id = b.professor_id INNER JOIN course_package c on b.course_code = c.course_code WHERE b.student_id = #{studentId} AND a.course_code = #{courseCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM course_package WHERE course_code = #{courseCode} AND student_id = #{studentId}
